name: Very Large Golf
description:
--NOTICE: Link on splash screen is out of date!--

Entry for Ludum Dare Game Jam 41, hosted in April 2018
Theme: Combine Two Incompatible Genres
(genres: absurd humor/planetary simulation/golf)

Welcome To Golf

have fun with golf, learn facts about golf, hit a golf ball,
go to space stay perfectly within the atomsphere,
and many more in this all in one game of golf and golf peripheries!

Features
  • golf
  • fun facts about golf
  • golf balls
  • space travel terrestrial travel
  • hitting of golf balls
  • black holes golf holes
  • little marker flags for the golf hole
  • now made with real eggs
Enjoy Golf!
Technical Details

This game uses the Pico-8 colour palette.
This game was made in GameMaker Studio v1.4.1804 pro.
Fair warning, the planetary golfing physics can be a bit hard to predict sometimes.
